title: Insert runtime.Gosched() after goroutines as well
body:
by **ag@ashishgandhi.org**: 
This is my first evey "bug" report for a language so apologies for anything
that may not be customary.

If I understand it correctly; to enforce cooperation among goroutines the complier
effectively inserts runtime.Gosched() after function calls. I feel like it'd be a good
idea to do the same after a goroutine is spun off. Given how gorutines are implement
(http://research.swtch.com/goabstract) this makes even more sense.
